titleStmt.title: ལས་ཀྱི་སྒྲིབ་པ་རྣམ་པར་སྦྱོང་བའི་ཆོ་ག་བཤད་པ།
las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba'i cho ga bshad pa/
Karmāvaraṇa­viśodhana­viddhi­bhāṣya
An Explanation on the Ritual of the Purification of Karmic Obstructions
ལས་ཀྱི་སྒྲིབ་པ་རྣམ་པར་སྦྱོང་བའི་ཆོ་ག་བཤད་པ་ཞེས་བྱ་བ།
las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba'i cho ga bshad pa zhes bya ba/
Karmāvaraṇa­viśodhana­viddhi­bhāṣya­nāma

bibl.author: Atīśa Dīpaṃkaraśrījñāna
Atīśa Dīpaṃkaraśrījñāna
lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba

notesStmt.note: According to Mochizuki (1999), the composition can be classified into three major sections as follows: (1) a ritual to remove obstacles to a bodhisattva's dedication, consisting of (a) confession, (b) generating regret, (c) supplication for protection, and (d) reflecting on the faults and their consequences; (2) taking up virtuous activities consisting of (a) naturally virtuous activities in terms of cause-fruit, (b) bodhisattva commitments, and (c) virtues arising from extalted wisdom, and consolidating these into all activities; and (3) dedicating the fruits of these to the final goal of complete enlightenment.
